unnormalised: Organic farming is the way to go, yaar! My nani in Kerala always said the old ways are the best. Less chemicals, more taste! Remember that scene in "Lagaan" where they struggled with the land? We gotta treat our soil like gold. I heard IARI is doing great research on organic methods. Let's ditch the DAP fertilizer and go natural like Raju from next gaon! It's better for everyone, na? Even my dog agrees! Jai Kisan!
